item.dc:creator: @daniel89 daniel89
item.description:
@daniel89 wrote:

Im just guessin but if he did get it to work wouldnt he have to edit his save boolean so it saves the second inventory also if not the second inventory would disappear upon log out correct? Even then you would probley have to edit a few other codes for when one inventory is full is adds items to the second inventory and stuff like that.

Idk im just thinkin outloud lol

item.source: [Help]Is it posible to make a 2nd inventory in music tab? Plz help how it.[Help]

item.title: [Help]Is it posible to make a 2nd inventory in music tab? Plz help how it.[Help]
item.dc:creator: @00rYn00 00rYn00
item.description:
@00rYn00 wrote:

get the tab button for the music tab (I dont know what this is)
and get the interface for the runescape inventory (dont know the ID for it)
and then in your client.java make an action button case for the music tab and make it open the inventory…
that might work but I’m not sure

it would look something like this

(find where the action buttons are located then put this)

case (MUSIC TAB ID) :

showInterface(INVENTORY INTERFACE, SCREENCOORDSX, SCREENCOORDSY)
break;

now I’m not sure if that will work or not (chances are it wont, but it’s worth a shot )
however I’m guessing (based from the 500+'s) that when you click the music tab and it shows the inventory, it might end up showing YOUR inventory instead of a blank one… so like say you put a bandos godsword in your regular inventory and then you click on the music tab, it will still show the bandos godsword… but I’m just saying, you might just want to try it out and see

Read full topic
